mapper.update:
UPDATE OM_ORG
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
org_code = #{org_code,jdbcType=varchar},
org_name = #{org_name,jdbcType=varchar},
org_type = #{org_type,jdbcType=varchar},
org_degree = #{org_degree,jdbcType=varchar},
org_status = #{org_status,jdbcType=varchar},
org_level = #{org_level,jdbcType=decimal},
guid_parents = #{guid_parents,jdbcType=varchar},
org_seq = #{org_seq,jdbcType=varchar},
org_addr = #{org_addr,jdbcType=varchar},
zipcode = #{zipcode,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_position = #{guid_position,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_emp_master = #{guid_emp_master,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_emp_manager = #{guid_emp_manager,jdbcType=varchar},
link_man = #{link_man,jdbcType=varchar},
link_tel = #{link_tel,jdbcType=varchar},
email = #{email,jdbcType=varchar},
web_url = #{web_url,jdbcType=varchar},
start_date = #{start_date,jdbcType=date},
end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=date},
area = #{area,jdbcType=varchar},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=timestamp},
last_update = #{last_update,jdbcType=date},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=varchar},
sort_no = #{sort_no,jdbcType=decimal},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=char},
sub_count = #{sub_count,jdbcType=decimal},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
